title: What’s at stake in Super Bowl LI?
itunes:title: What’s at stake in Super Bowl LI?
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, & Gregg Rosenthal – discuss all the latest news from around the NFL including the LA Chargers hiring Anthony Lynn as their new head coach, and Mike Tomlin’s reaction to Antonio Brown’s Facebook Live video. Then, the heroes debut a new segment called “Wheel of Destiny” in which they answer the most pressing questions surrounding Championship Sunday and Super Bowl LI.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
